golad.lib

Interface MutableBoard

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Board
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractMutableBoard, DefaultBoard

    public interface MutableBoard
extends Board
    This interface represents a GOLAD board which's state can be altered. See Board for specifics on coordinates.
    Author:
    Megacrafter127
    See Also:
    Board

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void copy(Board src, int srcx, int srcy, int trgx, int trgy, int w, int h)
      Copies the CellStates of a specified rectangular area of another Board.
      MutableBoard iterate()
      Generates the state of this Board after one iteration of GOLAD, and returns a Board containing it.
      void iterateSelf()
      Overwrites the current state of this board with the state it would have after 1 GOLAD tick.
      CellState setCellStateAt(int x, int y, CellState newState)
      Changes the state of a cell.

      • Methods inherited from interface golad.lib.Board

        getAliveNeighborCount, getCellStateAt, getHeight, getNeighborCellCount, getTotalCellCount, getWidth

    • Method Detail

      • setCellStateAt

        CellState setCellStateAt(int x,
                       int y,
                       CellState newState)
                         throws NullPointerException,
                                IndexOutOfBoundsException
        Changes the state of a cell.
        Parameters:
        x - The X coordinate of the cell
        y - The Y coordinate of the cell
        newState - The new state the cell should have
        Returns:
        the previous state of the cell
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - If newState is null.
        IndexOutOfBoundsException - If the specified coordinates are outside of this board.

      • copy

        void copy(Board src,
        int srcx,
        int srcy,
        int trgx,
        int trgy,
        int w,
        int h)
          throws NullPointerException,
                 IndexOutOfBoundsException
        Copies the CellStates of a specified rectangular area of another Board.
        Parameters:
        src - The Board to copy from
        srcx - The X coordinate of the top-leftmost cell of the area to copy from
        srcy - The Y coordinate of the top-leftmost cell of the area to copy from
        trgx - The X coordinate of the top-leftmost cell of the area to copy into
        trgy - The Y coordinate of the top-leftmost cell of the area to copy into
        w - The width of the copied area
        h - The height of the copied area
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - If src is null.
        IndexOutOfBoundsException - If any part of the area to copy from or to is outside of the respective Board.

      • iterate

        MutableBoard iterate()
        Description copied from interface: Board
        Generates the state of this Board after one iteration of GOLAD, and returns a Board containing it. Preferably the returned Board should be of the same class as this Board.
        Specified by:
        iterate in interface Board
        Returns:
        a Board in the state which this board would be in after one iteration of GOLAD.

      • iterateSelf

        void iterateSelf()
        Overwrites the current state of this board with the state it would have after 1 GOLAD tick.
